title: Outriders Coming to Xbox Game Pass! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.15.21
description:
Game Informer's Liana Ruppert joins Blessing to talk about Outriders coming to Game Pass, Nintendo's possible biggest fiscal year, and more!

Follow Liana: https://twitter.com/DirtyEffinHippy

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:28 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Wild Aces are in the FCF Championship. Come call the plays as we take on the Glacier boys this Saturday on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames at 6:30 p.m. PT!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - Outriders is Coming to Xbox Game Pass on Day One - New.Xbox.Com
00:16:40 - Why is it getting compared to games like Destiny and other live service games? - Best Friends Q:DJBradChill
00:26:20 - Speaking of Xbox: Five Bethesda Titles are getting the FPS Boost Treatment on Xbox Series X|S Today - news.Xbox.com
00:33:25 -  Could this next year possibly be Nintendo’s best year in Software sales?
00:41:50 -  Ad
00:46:26 -  Fall Guys is Getting Among Us Costumes With 'Unique' Features - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:51:50 - Balan Wonderworld producer Noriyoshi Fujimoto addresses demo feedback - Square Enix Blog
00:55:31 - PlayStation Is Officially Shutting Down PS4 Communities - Rollin Bishop @ ComicBook.com
01:06:24 - Out today
01:07:25 - Squad Up:TheLegendofTheo (PSN) - TheLegendofTheo
01:08:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary Whitta
